heroTitle.default:

heroSubtitleMain.default: Ashtech Presidential Towers by Ashtech Group

heroSubtitleText.default: A legacy of trust and precision, now shaping exquisite homes that redefine luxury living.

overviewTitle.default: From Foundations of Strength to Towers of Excellence

overviewText1.default: For over three decades, Ashtech Group has been synonymous with engineering excellence, innovation, and integrity. After establishing a strong legacy in infrastructure and industrial development, we now bring the same commitment to luxury real estate in Greater Noida, West, with Ashtech Presidential Towers, a true landmark of refinement and responsibility.

overviewText2.default: Every residence we craft embodies our core philosophy â€” precision in construction, sustainability in design, and a deep understanding of the people we build for. We are dedicated to creating homes that stand the test of time, inspire every day, and enrich life for generations to come.
